entry.def: The veldt is a high area of flat grassy land with very few trees in southern Africa.

example.ex: ...a gang of hyenas, stalking about the veldt.
example.tran: 一群在草原上游弋的土狼

means.word_mean: 1. elevated open grassland in southern Africa

auth_sentence.content: The veldt in this region is dry and stony, speckled with waterberry and gardenia trees.
